definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: However, the condom barrier effect of the virus Just how big?
sentences.chinese: 但是，避孕套对病毒的阻隔效果究竟有多大？

sentences.english: Conformity almost always leads to a deadening of individual creativity and energy.
sentences.chinese: 一致几乎总是阻隔个人的创造力和活力。

sentences.english: The wax repels water and, consequently, most contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 蜡可以阻隔水和污染物。

sentences.english: The tissue can effectively block the spread of droplets containing germs.
sentences.chinese: 面纸可有效阻隔含菌小水珠的散布。

sentences.english: So their view was blocked by high wall and limited by this small window.
sentences.chinese: 因此他们视线被这高的墙和小的窗子所阻隔。

sentences.english: Specks in a sea of night. You will never find us.
sentences.chinese: 由于夜之海的阻隔，你们永远无法找到我们。

sentences.english: This is definitely an obstruction that blocks people who want to communicate each other.
sentences.chinese: 这碓实是一个障碍，阻隔了人们彼此沟通。

sentences.english: But Luo gradually felt restricted by the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 但是罗渐渐觉得被这块布阻隔了。

sentences.english: The natural barrier of the Yangtze River turns out a bottleneck" restricting the fast development of the central region of Jiangsu Province."
sentences.chinese: 长江口的天堑阻隔是制约苏中快速发展的“瓶颈”。

sentences.english: The thick walls of the great hall baffled the square noises.
sentences.chinese: 大会堂的厚墙把广场上的噪音阻隔了。

sentences.english: Athletes won't be required to wear the masks, which use carbon filters to block pollutants.
sentences.chinese: 奥委会不要求运动员戴上用碳滤器阻隔污染物的面具。

sentences.english: This is exercise to connect with the world around, not tune it out.
sentences.chinese: 这是让你同周围的世界相连而非将它阻隔在外的锻炼。

sentences.english: The Yangtze River and the Huaihe River are not barriers but starting points.
sentences.chinese: 不因淮河而阻隔，不因长江而中断。

sentences.english: Ordinary cameras use filters to block any light in the infrared spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 普通相机用滤光片来阻隔红外光谱范围内的任何光线。

sentences.english: I hope this write up will be of use to all lovers out there living under the tyranny of distance.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这些文字将对被距离阻隔的恋人们有所帮助。

sentences.english: In time you will learn to work kindly with the barrage of thoughts and you will some clarity and peacefulness.
sentences.chinese: 最后你将学会温和的处理思想的阻隔，获得清晰平和。

definition: to cover/to hide from view/to obstruct or block/defilade (military)
partition/to stand between/wall or fence serving as partition
to make (military) incursions/to invade/to intrude into/to trespass/to gain unauthorized access (computing)
